msg: This is the default file served by the 'store' path. To access a stored file, use a ? for a query string, and add the filename to the request.
example: To get file 'myFile', use http://server:3040/store/?myFile in the browser / curl / etc.
info: Info can be stored on the server if the method is put or post. Use a query string, as above, to set the filename. It will default to a timestamp if left blank.
